name: At The Beginning
description:
MADE FOR THE 45th LUDUM DARE

At the beginning, there was nothing.

A kind of narrative game where I'm the narrator, including me as sprite asset, as the only character, the only protagonist and antagonist.

Come with me in my strange tiny universe.

The best way to know what the game is, it's to play it !

For this jam version there have only one big end and some secrets hidden !
